text: Wide nasal bridge 90% Autosomal recessive inheritance - Generalized myoclonic seizures - Histidinuria - Impaired histidine renal tubular absorption - Intellectual disability - Rounded middle phalanx of finger - Short middle phalanx of finger - Smooth philtrum - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usual
